amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the development or approval of any drug intended solely for the chemical inducement of abortion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the development or approval of any drug intended solely for the chemical inducement of abortion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 187 (Roll no. 373).
